name: patient_age
description: Patient age, must be 18 years or older

name: patient_bmi
description: Body Mass Index. Eligible if ≥40, or ≥35 with comorbid condition

name: comorbidity_flag
description: Indicates if patient has an obesity-related comorbidity (e.g., diabetes, cardiovascular disease, hypertension, severe sleep apnea, Pickwickian syndrome, obesity-related cardiomyopathy)

name: weight_loss_program_history
description: Indicates past participation in a weight loss program

name: conservative_therapy_attempt
description: Indicates inadequate weight loss despite comprehensive lifestyle interventions (diet, exercise, behavioral modifications)

name: preop_medical_clearance
description: Indicates whether pre-operative medical evaluation and clearance were completed

name: preop_psych_clearance
description: Indicates whether pre-operative mental health evaluation and clearance were completed

name: preop_education_completed
description: Indicates whether pre-operative education about risks, benefits, expectations, long-term follow-up, and behavioral adherence was completed

name: treatment_plan_documented
description: Indicates whether a treatment plan addressing pre- and post-operative needs is documented

name: procedure_code_ICD10PCS
description: Covered ICD-10 procedure codes for bariatric surgery (e.g., 0DP60CZ, 0DV64ZZ, 0D160ZA, 0DB60ZZ)
